products.title: Oslo Blackout Solar Yellow Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This bright sunny yellow roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Vitra Blackout Sunburst Yellow Roller Blind
products.description: Their vitra blackout sunburst yellow fabric is a stunning, bright but subtle shade of yellow, perfect to add a bright pop of colour into your interiors. This shade will work beautifuly as an accent with chic grey shades but will also compliment natural wooden tones. A real all rounder. Blackout fabrics will completely block light from coming through making them a perfect addition for bedrooms and any room that requires maximum light control.

products.title: Konya Blackout Primrose Yellow
products.description: Konya blackout primrose yellow plain roller blind the konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester, with a pvc blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade.

products.title: Vitra Blackout Sunburst Yellow 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: This sunburst yellow blackout vertical blind adds a invigorating splash of colour to your home, whilst blocking the light. Value for money and made from high-quality polyester-based fabric, your new yellow blackout vertical blind is perfect for office, bedroom and living rooms. At swift direct blinds, not only is is this bright yellow vertical blind hand made to your measurements, by their expert team, it also comes with a free five year guarantee.

products.title: Boheme Pvc Blackout Summer Yellow Roller Blind
products.description: The warm, golden hues of this roller blind will definitely catch the eye. Boheme pvc blackout summer yellow blind is the ideal way to add a splash of colour to your favourite room. With a fabulously modern geometrical leaf design outlined in white, it's a cheerful window dressing that will stand the test of time. Plus, it has double sided print that can be admired from outside too. This blind is made from blackout fabric to prevent unwanted light travelling into your room and its flame retardant for safety.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Yellow - Roller Blind
products.description: The soft sunshine of the palermo (blackout) yellow will add a cheery freshness to a window, even when it's doing its job of blocking out the outside light. Add to that the superior quality of the sleek blackout fabric and you have the perfect window covering. Use this blind in a modern country kitchen for both function and style; paired with other pastels and pretty florals, your window covering will give the room a summery, airy feel.

products.title: Bella Blackout Mellow Yellow 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: This pastel mellow yellow vertical blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. Their bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. Loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms.

products.title: Willow Blackout Brazen Yellow Roller Blind
products.description: Decorated with delicate branches in a subdued colour palette, the willow brazen yellow blackout roller blind will have a soothing effect in any room. The gentle tones and soft drawn art style will bring a touch of pared back femininity to a space. This delightful design will team well with warm greys, yellows, silver and mustard tones. products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Yellow - Vertical Blind
products.description: The soft, pastel hue of the palermo (blackout) yellow will bring colour and sunshine wherever it goes. When the sun is out, and the blind is open, they will serve only to accent each other, creating a gorgeous glow in your home. The yellow will work best with other pastels, or with whites, and can be used to add a subtle infusion of warm colour to an otherwise neutral room. Choose it for your home office or entry hallway for a distinctly pretty flush of colour.

products.description: The midas stripe blackout range comes in a variety of beautiful colour tones that will stand out in any room. products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Yellow - Loft Blind
products.description: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).
